ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool WhipÂ®), thawed
1 quart fresh strawberries, hulled and halved
n: Berries and Cream Shortcake On The Go
des: "These fun, light, yummy shortcake-like desserts are ready in 5 minutes, and are something everyone will love!  Use any berries or fruits that you like.  I was able to prepare these in a motor home, so they are versatile & easy to make while camping, too! A nice summer treat for a small family or a large crowd."
ins: Top each cake with about 2 tablespoons whipped topping. Distribute strawberries, raspberries, and blackberries on top.
